address: Box ISSUE FEE, Commissioner of Patents and Trademarks, Washington, D.C. 20231
notice: Notice of Allowance and Issue Fee Due
application_status: The application identified above has been examined and is allowed for issuance as a patent. Prosecution on the merits is closed.
issue_fee_due: The issue fee must be paid within three months from the mailing date of this notice or this application shall be regarded as abandoned. This statutory period cannot be extended.

small_entity_status.if_yes: Verify your current SMALL ENTITY status.
small_entity_status.if_no: Pay FEE DUE shown above or file verified statement of Small Entity Status before or with payment of 1/2 the FEE DUE shown above.

response_instructions.part_b: Part B of this notice should be completed and returned to the Patent and Trademark Office (PTO) with your ISSUE FEE.
response_instructions.part_c: If you are charging the ISSUE FEE to your deposit account, Part C of this notice should also be completed and returned.

communication_instructions: All communications regarding this application must give series code (or filing date), serial number, and batch number. Please direct all communications prior to issuance to Box ISSUE FEE unless advised to the contrary.
